member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter
member.summary: Represents the action type converter class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.CanConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Specifies whether the action type converter can convert from a specified source object.
member.returns: True if the action type converter can convert from a specified source object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.CanConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Specifies whether the action type converter can convert to a specified destination object.
member.returns: True if the action type converter can convert to a specified destination object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Converts the action type object from a specified object.
member.returns: The converted action type object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts the action type object to a specified object.
member.returns: The converted action type object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Gets the collection of standard values of the action type object.
member.returns: The collection of standard values of the action type object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ActionTypeConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns the standard values supported by the action type object.
member.returns: Always returns true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask
member.summary: Represents a transfer database task.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating whether the task is copying or moving databases.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration that indicates a move or copy action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.DestinationConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection manager for the destination database.
member.returns: The name of the connection manager for the destination database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.DestinationDatabaseFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database files for the destination database.
member.returns: The name of the database files for the destination database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.DestinationDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database at the destination.
member.returns: The name of the database at the destination.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.DestinationOverwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the destination database can be overwritten if it exists.
member.returns: true if the destination database can be overwritten if it exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating whether to use Online or Offline transfer method.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.ReattachSourceDatabase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the database should be reattached or not.
member.returns: true if the database reattaches; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.SourceConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection manager for the source database.
member.returns: The name of the connection manager for the source database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.SourceDatabaseFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the names of the source database files to transfer.
member.returns: The names of the source database files to transfer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.ITransferDatabaseTask.SourceDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source database to transfer.
member.returns: The name of the source database to transfer.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferAction
member.summary: Used by the property to determine if the transfer is a copy or a move.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferAction.Copy
member.summary: The action is a copy.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferAction.Move
member.summary: The action is a move.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask
member.summary: Allows the transfer of a database between a source and a destination server using two different methods: database online, and database offline. The task requires the use of an SMO Connection Manager.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating whether the Transfer Database task is copying or moving databases.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration that indicates a move or copy action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.DestinationConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the SMO connection manager for the destination database.
member.returns: A String that contains the SMO connection manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.DestinationDatabaseFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the database files for the destination database.
member.returns: A String that contains the name of the data and log files for the destination database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.DestinationDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the database at the destination.
member.returns: A String that contains the name of the database at the destination.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.DestinationOverwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean indicating whether the destination database can be overwritten if it exists.
member.returns: true indicates that the existing database at the destination is overwritten during the transfer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.Execute(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSComponentEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging,System.Object)
member.summary: Runs the task.
member.returns: A enumeration that indicates the outcome of the execution.
member.param: The transaction object that the container is a part of, depending on the value found in the property. This value can be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.ExecutionValue
member.summary: Returns the result of the task execution.
member.returns: A user-defined object. The task always returns 1.

member.summary: Initializes the properties associated with the task. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.
member.param: A collection of connections used by the task.
An object that implements the interface.
An object that implements the interface.
A collection that contains events to be raised during execution of the task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.LoadFromXML(System.Xml.XmlElement,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: This method is not callable by your application code. To load a package saved as .xml, use the method.
member.param: The XmlElement that contains the information to be loaded.
An object that implements the interface for raising events (errors, warnings, and so on) during persistence.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating whether to use Online or Offline transfer method.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.ReattachSourceDatabase
member.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the database should be reattached or not.
member.returns: true if the database reattaches; false if the database does not reattach.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.SaveToXML(System.Xml.XmlDocument,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: This method is not callable by your application code. To save a package as .xml, use the method.
member.param: The in-memory XmlDocument to save the information to.
An object that implements the interface for raising events (errors, warnings, and so on) during persistence.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.SourceConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the SMO connection manager for the source database.
member.returns: A String that contains the connection string of the SMO connection manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.SourceDatabaseFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the names of the source database files to transfer.
member.returns: A String that contains the names of the data and log files to transfer from the source database. If multiple files are specified, they are delimited with a semi-colon.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.SourceDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the source database to transfer.
member.returns: A String that contains the name of the source database to transfer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.Validate(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSComponentEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging)
member.summary: Verifies that the task component is correctly configured.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.
member.param: A collection of connections used by the task.
An object that implements the interface.
An object that implements the interface.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferDatabaseTask.DtsTransferDBException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown at load time if the persisted name of the XML root node of the task is corrupt.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferMethod
member.summary: Used by the to determine whether the move or copy will occur in online mode or offline mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferMethod.DatabaseOffline
member.summary: The database files are copied or moved to the specified location in Offline mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferDatabaseTask.TransferMethod.DatabaseOnline
member.summary: The database files are copied or moved in Online mode using the SMO transfer object.
